attributes.action: ask the Home Secretary to tell the Police to Prosecute anyone who drives unnecessarily slow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How often has your car journey, to work or perhaps shopping, been slowed down and the process lengthened somewhat by people who drift along A-roads, (they usually have a 60mph speed limit) at 35-36 fluctuating up to 42-43mph every now and then interspersed with random brake light illuminations. When entering a 30mph zone they carry on oblivious, at around 40-45mph. This is a crime & these people should be caught & arrested, not to mention the economy slow down - think of them all, all over the country.
